snippet: A derivatives rule is set to change. | JPMorgan’s data breach causes alarm. | Chinese companies are scooping up real estate across the globe. | Former Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner defends the bailout of A.I.G.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Changing a Rule on Derivatives
